name: Rogue's faces
description:
This is the game we made for the Atomium's "Pot-au-jeu 2.0" game jam !
We made it with a team of four - one game designer and three programmers.

You play with a mouse only and interact with enemies and surroundings. Investigating a village suspected of using slavery to dig ore, you were captured. 
You take the appearance of those you kill. Use this ability to escape the prison and kill the captain of slavers without being noticed !

Credits : We used some Unreal permanently free assets packages, thanks to their creators and distributors !
- Advanced Village Pack (more here : https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/profile/Advanced+Asset+Packs)
- Medieval Dungeon (Infuse Studio, more here : https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/profile/Infuse+Studio
- Modular RPG Heroes Polyart (Dungeon Mason, more here : https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/profile/Dungeon+Mason)

Credits for sounds :
- https://freesound.org/people/FunWithSound/sounds/ (Creative Common 3.0 https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/)
- https://freesound.org/people/EFlexMusic/sounds/ (Creative Common 0 https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/)
- Prison music : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FVmWdIwjgKA
- Village music : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1xbvqsnOD-k
